attribution: Provided by the Library of Congress
description: Bird's-eye view. Relief shown pictorially. Shows Los Angeles city and and vicinity. LC copy mounted on cloth backing. Includes index to points of interest. Imperfect: Stained, darkened, small portions of sheet torn along edge. Available also through the Library of Congress Web site as a raster image. PM3 Acquisitions control no.: 2006-001
label: Los Angeles, 1909.
